title: Tesla Inc. stock falls Wednesday, underperforms market
text:
Shares of Tesla Inc. 
        TSLA,
        -2.25%
       dropped 0.43% to $233.94 Wednesday, on what proved to be an all-around great trading session for the stock market, with the NASDAQ Composite Index 
        COMP,
        -0.12%
       rising 0.75% to 14,969.65 and the Dow Jones Industrial Average 
        DJIA,
        +0.12%
       rising 0.45% to 37,695.73. This was the stock's second consecutive day of losses. Tesla Inc. closed $65.35 below its 52-week high ($299.29), which the company achieved on July 19th. Trading volume (91.3 M) remained 26.7 million below its 50-day average volume of 118.0 M.
